page.title: 06Housing
page.content: The cost of housing in Saffron Walden is high. This is for two reasons. Firstly Saffron Walden is a pleasant place to live. Many people work in London but don't want to live there. It is easy to travel in by train so they move out to live in the countryside. They earn high salaries and this has tended to move the prices upwards. Secondly there is an odd mix of housing. On the new estates there are a lot of small houses with 2 or 3 bedrooms and a lounge diner. There are a lot of larger older properties. But there is a shortage of medium sized 3 and 4 bedroomed houses. A house like that will cost about Â£65,000. This is Â£8-10,000 more than a year ago.
